external_games.name: Leisure Suit Larry: Box Office Bust

name: Leisure Suit Larry: Box Office Bust
storyline: In Leisure Suit Larry: Box Office Bust, you play as Larry Lovage, nephew of the notorious Larry Laffer, who lands a summer gig at Laffer Studios, his uncle’s bustling movie production company. Larry’s mission? To sniff out a mole leaking secrets to a rival studio. Set in a zany version of Hollywood, the game mixes exploration, quirky puzzles, and oddball tasks with the series’ trademark cheeky humor. It’s a lighthearted romp through the wild world of movie-making, packed with laughs and just enough mystery to keep you guessing.
summary:
The Leisure Suit Larry Box Office Bust video game gives gamers an all-access pass to the glitz, glamour, and gorgeous women of Tinseltown.

In this third-person adventure game, Larry takes a summer job working on his Uncle Larry's movie lot doing odd jobs and trying to uncover a mole from another studio who threatens to air their dirty laundry in the tabloids.

Leisure Suit Larry Box Office Bust is a rollicking, innuendo-laden lampoon of Hollywood that features open-world sandbox gameplay that uses exploration, platforming, racing, and puzzle-solving to complete missions.
